title: Drawing, "The Rise of Rome: Male Head in Left Profile, Julius Caesar"
description: The present sketch for a book jacket design features top and bottom black bands stretched across the front cover and spine. On the front, in yellow capitals, Rise of Rome is inscribed on the top band and By Gordon King on the bottom. Within a circle on the front cover, right, a man in left profile, tilted downward, wears a laurel wreath. Jul[ius]/ Caesar is imprinted in antique Roman style capitals in the space to the left of the nose and chin.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "The Rise of Rome: Male Head in Left Profile, Julius Caesar". 28.5 x 21.9 cm (11 3/16 x 8 5/8 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-11.
